Sentencas: Nd1-xCaxCrO3 (0 <= x <= 0.25) solid solutions are synthesized using a two-step calcination solid-state reaction method and can potentially be used as interconnect applications in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Preparation, Electrical Conductivity, and Thermal Expansion Behavior of Dense Nd1-xCaxCrO3 Solid Solutions

Sentencas: The lattice parameters and unit cell volume decrease with an increase of the Ca2+ dopant concentration at the A-site.
Titulo: Preparation, Electrical Conductivity, and Thermal Expansion Behavior of Dense Nd1-xCaxCrO3 Solid Solutions

Sentencas: On the other hand, the relative density, electrical conductivity, and thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) increase with an increase of Ca2+ contents.
Titulo: Preparation, Electrical Conductivity, and Thermal Expansion Behavior of Dense Nd1-xCaxCrO3 Solid Solutions

Sentencas: Calcium doping significantly depresses the chromium vaporization of NdCrO3, thus accelerating the sintering and densification of the oxides.
Titulo: Preparation, Electrical Conductivity, and Thermal Expansion Behavior of Dense Nd1-xCaxCrO3 Solid Solutions

Sentencas: Nd1-xCaxCrO3 with x=0.25 shows the best electrical conductivity of 28.8 and 1.1 S/cm at 850 degrees C in air and hydrogen, respectively, with a high relative density of 98.0% and a good TEC of 9.19 x 10(-6) K-1 in the temperature range from 30 degrees to 1000 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Preparation, Electrical Conductivity, and Thermal Expansion Behavior of Dense Nd1-xCaxCrO3 Solid Solutions

Sentencas: This indicates that Nd0.75Ca0.25CrO3 is a promising candidate as an interconnect material for application in SOFCs.
Titulo: Preparation, Electrical Conductivity, and Thermal Expansion Behavior of Dense Nd1-xCaxCrO3 Solid Solutions
